title: Galactic  Civilizations  I  Ultimate  Edition  GOG
description:
Title: Galactic Civilizations I: Ultimate Edition
Genre: strategy / economic / sci-fi
Released: 26th March 2003
Developer: Stardock
Publisher: Stardock
Description:
The year is 2178. The Terran Alliance has invented a new technology, Hyperdrive. But the secret has leaked to the other civilizations starting a race for all the inhabitable worlds in the galaxy! As leader of the United Earth, you must research new technologies, build an economy, create a powerful military force, all the while carefully balancing your political, diplomatic and trade skills.

Galactic Civilizations I: Ultimate Edition combines the award-winning Galactic Civilizations with the Altarian Prophecy expansion pack to create a stellar adventure. Experience one of the best sci-fi 4x turn-based strategy games ever created!

Bonus content: avatars, editor manuals, game manual, soundtrack.

How to play:
1) Run setup_galactic_civilizations_2.0.0.4.exe and install the game;
2) Start the game using main executable or shortcuts (DRM free).

If you like the game, BUY it!

www.gog.com/gamecard/galactic_civilizations_i_ultimate_edition
